pr_title: Add option to archive verified signature files

timeline.message:
Add option to keep signatures

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: Using parser specific properties in a generic utility class is a code smell. It also didn't allow for code reuse with the new downloader properties. Instead move this back to layer where it belongs even if it duplicates 4 lines of code. This duplication will be gone anyway once we integrate balance parsing into the new framework (#573).
timeline.author: steven-sheehy
